label: 撰銭令
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Decrees issued in the late Muromachi period by the Ashikaga bakufu, regional overlords (shugo daimyo), and even local powers and shōen proprietors, specifying acceptable mixes of good" and "inferior" coins of varying values acceptable for paying dues and, at times, for market transactions.　[足利幕府、守護大名、荘園]"
